auth.2faEmailDescription: To continue, please confirm the two-factor verification code sent to your email address ({{email}}) before continuing.

blockchain.canAffordMessage: Bạn hiện có {{amount}} ETH. Số tiền này có thể không đủ để trang trải phí gas mạng Ethereum cho giao dịch. Hãy thử giảm giá gas.

messenger.notEncryptedMessage: Xin chào @{{user}}! Có vẻ như bạn chưa thiết lập mật khẩu trò chuyện đã mã hóa của mình. Chúng tôi khuyên bạn nên sử dụng mật khẩu khác với mật khẩu tài khoản của bạn để tăng cường bảo mật.
messenger.onboardingText: Mật khẩu bổ sung là bắt buộc đối với người nhắn tin để đảm bảo rằng nội dung tin nhắn của bạn là riêng tư và được mã hóa hoàn toàn.
messenger.setupMessage1: Bạn chỉ cần nhập mật khẩu mã hóa này một lần miễn là bạn vẫn đăng nhập.
messenger.setupMessage2: Điều quan trọng là không ai khác ngoài bạn và những người bạn đang giao tiếp có thể truy cập nội dung thư của bạn.
messenger.setupMessage3: Mặc định, nội dung thư của bạn được mã hóa hoàn toàn. Để tăng cường bảo mật, bạn có thể chuyển đến cài đặt ứng dụng và tắt thông báo đẩy để tránh hoàn toàn khả năng dữ liệu bị theo dõi.

settings.disableDescription: Vô hiệu hóa tài khoản của bạn sẽ ẩn thông tin của bạn. Bạn sẽ không nhận bất kỳ email hay thông báo nào . Username của bạn sẽ được phục hồi nếu bạn quay lại Minds
settings.deleteDescription: Cảnh báo: Hành động này không thể khôi phục, bạn sẽ mất kênh và dữ liệu của mình vĩnh viễn. Kênh của bạn sẽ không được khôi phục. Username của bạn sẽ được bất kỳ ai sử dụng

settings.TFAdescription: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. In addition to your username and password, you’ll need to enter a code that Minds sends to you via text or an app on your phone.
settings.TFADisableDesc: Are you sure you wish to disable two-factor authentication on your Minds account?
settings.TFAEnterCode: Enter the six-digit code from the application
settings.TFARecoveryCodesDesc: Recovery codes are used to access your account in the event you cannot receive two-factor authentication codes.
settings.TFARecoveryCodesBeSure: Please make sure to store this information securely. If you lose it we can not guarantee that you will regain access to your account
settings.TFAVerifyDesc: Enter the following two-factor secret into your authenticator app

learnMore.title: Learn More
learnMore.howWork: How the new rewards system works
learnMore.p1: Minds rewards you with crypto for contributing to the network. The first step in joining our rewards program is to provide your mobile number. We convert your number into a hash ID using SHA-256 encryption and a salt key to create a unique identifier for your account. We do not store your number on our servers.
learnMore.p2: Rather than rewarding you with Points in real-time, we are now distributing our crypto rewards as a “Daily Reward Pool”. During the test network, we will be experimenting with how the Daily Reward Pool is calculated, but it will ideally be automated based on user participation once we move into the Main Ethereum network.
learnMore.p3: Every day, we measure your contributions to the network and you receive a “Contribution Score” which can be found in the Contributions section of your wallet. We then calculate how much you contributed to the network relative to the entire community, which determines the percentage of the Daily Reward Pool that you earn.
learnMore.p4: It is important to note that with the new system, you will only receive credit for unique interaction, and you can only earn credit from another unique user once per metric per day. (If a friend votes on my content 100 times in a day, I will only get credit for 1 vote). This is critical in preventing gaming and abuse of the system as we move into more valuable token rewards. We are essentially measuring how many unique users you reached in a given day.
learnMore.p5: Daily rewards will be distributed at 02:00 am GMT everyday into your OffChain address.
learnMore.howContributionsP: We calculate your contribution score each day using the following weighted scoring system. Please note that the new system only gives credit for unique engagement (users who have provided a mobile number), so not all engagement you receive will be factored into your score.
learnMore.onChainP1: OffChain tokens are stored on Minds servers, and they can be used the same way that you used your Points. There are no fees, and they can be used to Boost content for more views from the network or to Wire other creators who you support.
learnMore.onChainP2: You now have the ability to withdraw these tokens into your OnChain address.
learnMore.onChainP3: OnChain tokens are stored on the Ethereum public blockchain and are accessible from outside of the Minds platform, which is key for further decentralization. OnChain transactions, however, require a small Ethereum “gas” fee, which is the incentive for the Ethereum miners to process the transaction.
learnMore.onChainP4: For OnChain configuration, you have the ability to use MetaMask (a browser plugin), your mobile device, an existing Ethereum address or you can create your own with Minds. We recommend using MetaMask for the most seamless user experience. You can change this address by clicking on the “Addresses” tab on the wallet menu

referrals.description: If your friend signs up for Minds within 24 hours of clicking the link you shared with them, they’ll be added to your pending referrals. Once they sign up for the rewards program by setting up their Minds wallet, the referral is complete and you’ll both get +10 added to your contribution scores!
